EmailTemplate.subject: Unlock Your Data with Honeywell Forge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Introducing Honeywell Forge for Airlines, a nose-to-tail and air-to-ground data ingestion platform for airline operations. Analyze and unlock critical performance indicators like flight efficiency, maintenance, safety, block time analysis and ground turn optimization in a single solution.
ONE LOGIN. ONE PLATFORM. ONE GOAL.
A secure solution to help you achieve better insights that boost your profits, create higher aircraft availability and deliver superior on-time performance.
Learn how airlines are leveraging aviation’s most intelligent data-driven platform. Unlimited data insights are waiting to be unlocked… are you ready? Click below to get started.
START NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Honeywell_Forge_Airlines.html]]>
